description.value:
You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed in the Oath of the Ancients Spells table. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how oath spells work.

Oath of the Ancients Spells
Paladin LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplEnsnaringS]{Ensnaring Strike}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpeakWithA]{Speak with Animals}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.D6QGbgwR1uWDoYE4]{Misty Step}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.NvKRfSFIklUcvpLo]{Spike Growth}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.XlGyjqqQFUNuKCGb]{Plant Growth}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.MDbAnl6BDevq2FQV]{Protection from Energy}
13th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.KolbUmOsCNtHjOzO]{Ice Storm}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.VpQF5dLHsLyEErl1]{Stoneskin}
17th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.K0f8PDezkFVNeA4F]{Commune with Nature}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.XarLQRsuntkz5IB4]{Tree Stride}
